agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Agriculture & Livestock TIME & DATE: 10:30 AM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Monday, March 25, 2019 PLACE: E2.036 CHAIR: Rep. Drew Springer HB 1099 Guillen Relating to peace officers commissioned by the State Board of Veterinary Medical Examiners. HB 2596 White Relating to the regulation of raising or keeping six or fewer chickens by a political subdivision. HB 3070 King, Ken | et al. Relating to grants for emergency assistance under the rural volunteer fire department assistance program. HB 1489 Kacal Relating to including cuttings as a form of propagation for citrus budwood and citrus nursery stock certification programs. HB 2166 Kacal Relating to the administration of seed and plant certification in this state by the State Seed and Plant Certification Council and the Texas Crop Improvement Association. HB 3181 Bailes Relating to the use of certain drugs in breeding stock by or on the prescription of a veterinarian. HB 1591 Springer Relating to the regulation of disease control by the Animal Health Commission. HB 1851 Springer Relating to the requirement that the State Board of Veterinary Medical Examiners provide a copy of a complaint to the subject of the complaint. HB 2787 Springer Relating to certain confidential or privileged information related to veterinary care or treatment. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
